featured.text: About 1 in 5 persons suffers fever, headaches, and body aches, usually lasting a week or so.
According to fitness trainers, physically 36 exercises may make you breathe heavily and your muscles may ache temporarily, but exercise should not be painful.

definition.zh_def: 疼痛，通常是持續的或鈍痛的感覺。
definition.en_def: A continuous or prolonged dull pain.
definition.example: After the workout, I felt a dull ache in my muscles.
